title: Plat Supp LF Duo
body:
Just looking for a good adc G1/Plat + to duo with next season and prac with in the preseason. Don't really have any requirements, just don't rage, a mic is a + and have a positive attitude.

I'm not overly active right now but am still trying to get a few games a day in, if we do well we can LFT too.


IGN: MentalJack

replies.body: I'm Plat 4 ADC "mostly Draven, 98.99% one trick pony lel" I added you
